Jx.Store.Parser

Extends: Jx.Object

Base class for all parsers

Summary
Jx.Store.ParserExtends: Jx.Object
Functions
parseReads data passed to it by a protocol and parses it into a specific format needed by the store/record.
encodeTakes an Jx.Record object and encodes it into a format that can be transmitted by a protocol.

Functions

parse: function()

Reads data passed to it by a protocol and parses it into a specific format needed by the store/record.

Parameters

datastring of data to parse

encode

encode: function()

Takes an Jx.Record object and encodes it into a format that can be transmitted by a protocol.

Parameters

objectan object to encode
Base class for all other object in the JxLib framework.
parse: function()
Reads data passed to it by a protocol and parses it into a specific format needed by the store/record.
encode: function()
Takes an Jx.Record object and encodes it into a format that can be transmitted by a protocol.
